subscribe.confirm-sent: Please, <bold>activate</bold> your subscription from the email that we sent to {{email}}
subscribe.subscribe-campaign-title: Subscribe for news about the campaign
subscribe.subscribe-text-nonLoggedUser: Please, proceed as a guest and write down your email, on which you want to receive notifications for this campaign or you can log in. If you log in with your and password you will be able to manage your subscription from your Personal profile
subscribe.subscribe-text-nonLoggedUser-general: Please, proceed as a guest and write down your email, on which you want to receive notifications from us or you can log in. If you log in with your and password you will be able to manage your subscription from your Personal profile
subscribe.subscribe-text-loggedUser: Please, choose if you want to receive the news about the campaign on your profile email or on another one:
subscribe.subscribe-subtitle: I want to receive news and notifications from Podkrepi.bg on this email:
subscribe.subscribe-campaign-subtTitle: I want to receive news about the campaign on this email:

campaign.subheading: Your support for the world matters. All supporters through Podkrepi.bg are our partners in supporting the community campaign. As a generous benefactor, you become an important partner in supporting a campaign regarding someone's health or the success of a cause that is close to your heart.
campaign.title: Campaign name
campaign.notify: Send a notification to all subscribers

slug.name: Short name of the campaign
slug.warning: Editing this field will modify the campaign link and make the current one invalid.
slug.placeholder: The default value is the same as 'Campaign Name'.

campaign.noCommissionInfo: Podkrepi.bg works with 0% commission. Only expressly mentioned bank charges are possible.

info-graphics.donation-title: 100% of the donation goes to those in need
info-graphics.donation-text: No withholding of fees and commissions for Podkrepi.bg
